name: Last Hope (itch) (Tamatsu)
description:
You are the last hope for your dead friend. After calling out to you, you embark on a quest to find the 3 ingredients to a revival potion. If you don't find them, your friend will be lost forever...

Last Hope

A short adventure/exploration game made with GB Studio for one of my classes. Slip into the role of a plague doctor as you explore the world, search for keys, coins, doors and chests, and most importantly, the special ingredients to make a revival potion! 

Are you able to finish the game in less than 5 minutes? And get a score over 50? It might not be possible on your first try, but you can always try again...

Controls D-PadW, A, S, D, Arrow KeysMoveAJ, Z, AltInteractBK, X, ControlStartEnterMenuSelectShift
